name: The water ghost - LD 33
description:
Some stupid kids are trying to summon you. Show them that they better not wake you up.

Move with the arrow keys to chase the kids and kill them, but be careful to not collapse in a puddle! Avoid the fire and go back in the water to regain some energy.

Press m to mute music

Ludum Dare 33 link : http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=p...

Music:
"Unseen Horrors" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
